name: HorrorMovieAdventure

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: horror movie adventure
des: Would you survive a horror movie? This game tests your wits and decision making to see whether you would be a survivor in a horror movie in a choose your adventure style game. There are no prerequisites for this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
